presidentReport: Welcome to our December board meeting. As we close out the year, I'm pleased to report strong club activity and engagement.
Looking ahead to 2025, we have exciting plans for repeater upgrades and expanded educational programs.
vicePresidentReport: Final preparations for the repeater upgrade project are underway. Vendor selection will be completed in January.
Planning technical presentation series for spring, focusing on digital modes and antenna construction.

report: Both repeaters are operating normally. Completed winterization of the backup power system.
New duplexer filter for 70cm repeater has been ordered and should arrive in January.
Technician class planning is progressing well. Registration opens January 15th.
Secured classroom space at the community center. Looking for volunteer instructors.

oldBusiness: Field Day 2025 site selection - committee to report next month
Repeater upgrade funding approved - work to begin in February
Club website redesign - new site launched successfully
newBusiness: Proposal to sponsor local high school STEM club - approved
Summer picnic planning - June 20th tentative date
Request for club participation in emergency communications drill
announcements: Next VE session: February 5th at 10:00 AM
State convention registration now open - early bird discount until Feb 1st
Monthly breakfast: Every Saturday at 8:00 AM at Joe's Diner
Next board meeting: February 19th at 7:00 PM
